action.des: Pitcher Change: Jason Frasor replaces Brett Cecil.

atbat.des: Ben Francisco grounds out, third baseman Scott Rolen to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Kelly Shoppach singles on a line drive to left fielder Travis Snider.

pitch.cc: Jason Frasor is trying to tie up Kelly Shoppach with fastballs inside, where Kelly Shoppach hits .400.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Jesse Carlson replaces Jason Frasor.

atbat.des: Grady Sizemore singles on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios. Kelly Shoppach to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Jesse Carlson is trying to tie up Grady Sizemore with fastballs inside, where Grady Sizemore hits .333.

atbat.des: Asdrubal Cabrera singles on a ground ball to left fielder Travis Snider. Kelly Shoppach to 3rd. Grady Sizemore to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Jesse Carlson went back to the sinker even though Asdrubal Cabrera hit for a single last time up.
Jesse Carlson had Asdrubal Cabrera down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Victor Martinez singles on a fly ball to left fielder Travis Snider. Kelly Shoppach scores. Grady Sizemore to 3rd. Asdrubal Cabrera to 2nd.
Mark DeRosa grounds into a force out, pitcher Jesse Carlson to catcher Raul Chavez. Grady Sizemore out at home. Asdrubal Cabrera to 3rd. Victor Martinez to 2nd. Mark DeRosa to 1st.

action.des: With Shin-Soo Choo batting, wild pitch by Jesse Carlson, Asdrubal Cabrera scores. Victor Martinez to 3rd. Mark DeRosa to 2nd.

atbat.des: Jhonny Peralta singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Vernon Wells. Victor Martinez scores. Mark DeRosa scores. Shin-Soo Choo to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Brian Wolfe went back to the four-seam fastball even though Jhonny Peralta hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Matt LaPorta lines out to third baseman Scott Rolen.

pitch.cc: Brian Wolfe is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Tim Welke.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Rafael Perez replaces Anthony Reyes.
